trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Cinnabar is in need of a hand─preferably one that is armed.
TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_TODO_00<tab>Defeat the monsters swarming the crackling chasm to the northwest.
TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_TODO_01<tab>Defeat the monsters swarming the crackling chasm to the south.
TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_CINNABAR_000_000<tab>Ah, excellent. Just what I need─someone who looks like they know how to kill things.
TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_CINNABAR_000_001<tab>On your way here, did you happen to notice the dense pockets of lightning energy scattered around?

TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_CINNABAR_000_002<tab>These areas have a tendency to attract swarms of monsters. Normally we have a hunter clear them out, but given that they're shorthanded, I should like to hire you for the task instead.
TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_CINNABAR_000_003<tab>The most infested areas are in the northwest and the south. Oh, and a word of warning: try not to fall in. The tingle is most unpleasant.
TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_CINNABAR_000_004<tab>The infested craters can be found to the northwest and the south. Do try to slay any monsters you find before your weapon hand goes numb, yes?
TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_CINNABAR_000_005<tab>You've cleared them all out, I take it? Fantastic work.
TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_CINNABAR_000_006<tab>See that there, beyond the western shore─the menacing purple glow of the upturned city? We have the Storm Surge to thank for that.
TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_CINNABAR_000_007<tab>They say a wartime weapon created that gargantuan fount of lightning. And where such energy gathers, so too do monsters, tenfold.

TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_CINNABAR_000_008<tab>Compared to something like that, these little chasms seem downright decorative. Still, the monsters are a hazard that cannot go unchecked. <sigh> Would that we had a more permanent solution.
TEXT_KINGZF104_05158_CINNABAR_000_009<tab>Ah, but I digress. Your job here is done, and it is time you were paid for services rendered. Safe travels!
